persons: Sheik Mohammed bin Rashid al Maktoum
subject: Horse Racing
Horses
Auctions
lead_paragraph: Fasig-Tipton, the oldest thoroughbred auction company in North America, announced it was being sold to a company from Dubai, a move that further cements Dubai’s influence in the American horse business. The buyer, Synergy Investments, is headed by Abdulla Al Habbai, a close associate of Dubai’s ruler, Sheik Mohammed bin Rashid al Maktoum, who is a regular participant at American horse auctions.
